name: ClownBoarder
description:
Surf the slopes collecting balloons and doing 360's

Don't Land On Your Head

2 Levels currently

---------------------------------
AD or Arrows to Spin, B for Boost, Space for Jump
---------------------------------

Can you get onto the High Score Table?

Note: High Score table may be tidied/reset/archived periodically --------------------------------

Mini prototype game created for the Spin Boarding Quest as part of GameDev.Tv "Unity Challenge Club" starting to roll out live as of mid April 2021
